statements: SELECT * FROM sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT sensor_type, sensor_value FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_value > 50
SELECT location FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'temperature'
SELECT sensor_id, location FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_value < 20.5 ORDER BY sensor_id ASC
SELECT * FROM sensor_data ORDER BY location
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT sensor_id, location FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_value > 50 ORDER BY sensor_id ASC
SELECT sensor_type, location, sensor_value FROM sensor_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-02-01' ORDER BY sensor_value DESC
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'Pressure' AND location LIKE '%Floor%' ORDER BY location ASC
SELECT DISTINCT sensor_type FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_value < 30 ORDER BY sensor_type
SELECT * FROM sensors;
SELECT sensor_id, location, sensor_type FROM sensors WHERE status = TRUE;
SELECT sensor_id, location FROM sensors ORDER BY last_reading DESC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_tasks WHERE task_description LIKE '%inspection%';
SELECT sensor_id, assigned_to, created_at FROM maintenance_tasks ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature Sensor';
SELECT sensor_id, location, last_reading FROM sensors ORDER BY last_reading DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, location, status FROM sensors WHERE status = TRUE;
SELECT task_id, sensor_id, task_description, assigned_to FROM maintenance_tasks WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT task_id, sensor_id, task_description, assigned_to, created_at FROM maintenance_tasks WHERE task_description LIKE '%check%' ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data;
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM sensor_data ORDER BY sensor_name DESC;
SELECT sensor_type FROM sensor_data WHERE location = 'Warehouse';
SELECT sensor_name, last_reading FROM sensor_data WHERE last_reading > '2022-01-01';
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_type, last_reading FROM sensor_data ORDER BY last_reading ASC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, sensor_type FROM sensor_data ORDER BY sensor_type DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, location FROM sensor_data WHERE location LIKE '%Room%';
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, last_reading FROM sensor_data WHERE last_reading > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY last_reading ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, status, battery_level FROM sensor_data JOIN sensor_health ON sensor_data.sensor_id = sensor_health.sensor_id WHERE battery_level < 30;
SELECT * FROM Sensors;
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM Sensors ORDER BY sensor_id DESC;
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_type FROM Sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature';
SELECT * FROM SensorData WHERE reading > 50;
SELECT sensor_id, issue_description FROM MaintenanceLogs ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM Sensors;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, location, sensor_type FROM Sensors ORDER BY sensor_id DESC;
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_type FROM Sensors WHERE location = 'Factory A' AND sensor_type = 'Temperature';
SELECT * FROM SensorData WHERE reading > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT Sensors.sensor_name, MaintenanceLogs.timestamp, MaintenanceLogs.issue_description FROM Sensors JOIN MaintenanceLogs ON Sensors.sensor_id = MaintenanceLogs.sensor_id;
SELECT * FROM Sensors;
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM Sensors WHERE is_active = true;
SELECT * FROM SensorData ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_name, temperature, humidity FROM Sensors JOIN SensorData ON Sensors.sensor_id = SensorData.sensor_id;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM Users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT * FROM Sensors;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, location FROM Sensors WHERE is_active = TRUE;
SELECT data_id, sensor_id, temperature, humidity FROM SensorData WHERE temperature > 30;
SELECT log_id, sensor_id, timestamp, description FROM MaintenanceLogs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT alert_id, sensor_id, alert_type, alert_message FROM Alerts WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
